entry.title: Sunday: Light snow. High minus 17.
entry.summary: Light snow. Wind becoming northwest 20 km/h near noon. High minus 17. Wind chill minus 23 this morning and minus 30 this afternoon. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 04:30 AM EST Sunday 12 February 2023

entry.title: Sunday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 26. POP 40%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy with 40 percent chance of flurries. Wind west 20 km/h gusting to 40. Low minus 26. Wind chill minus 30 this evening and minus 37 overnight. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 04:30 AM EST Sunday 12 February 2023
